entry.def: If you acquire something, you buy or obtain it for yourself, or someone gives it to you.

example.ex: General Motors acquired a 50% stake in Saab for about $400m...
example.tran: 通用汽车公司以大约4亿美元的价格购得了萨博汽车公司50%的股份。

example.ex: I recently acquired some wood from a holly tree...
example.tran: 最近我从一棵冬青树上弄了些木料。

entry.def: If you acquire something such as a skill or a habit, you learn it, or develop it through your daily life or experience.

example.ex: I've never acquired a taste for wine...
Having read the book, she will be able to pass on the acquired knowledge to trainee teachers.
example.tran: 读完此书，她便能将从书中所得传授给实习教师。

entry.def: If someone or something acquires a certain reputation, they start to have that reputation.

example.ex: He has acquired a reputation as this country's premier solo violinist.
example.tran: 他已经赢得了该国首席小提琴独奏家的名誉。

entry.tran: 后天养成的爱好;培养出来的兴趣
entry.def: If you describe something as an acquired taste, you mean that a lot of people do not like it when they first experience it, but often start to like it more when they get to know it better.

example.ex: Broad beans are very much an acquired taste...
example.tran: 要慢慢适应才能吃得惯蚕豆。

example.ex: Living alone is an acquired taste.
example.tran: 独处是一种修得的境界。

sentences.sentence: "acquired characteristics (such as a suntan or a broken nose) cannot be passed on"

auth_sentence.content: Some aspects to these soundscapes are an acquired taste.

auth_sentence.content: Last year, it acquired its first aircraft carrier.
auth_sentence.res_content: Last year, it acquired its first aircraft carrier.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Last year, it acquired its first aircraft carrier.

auth_sentence.content: In this way, work acquired an ethical dimension.
auth_sentence.res_content: In this way, work acquired an ethical dimension.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In this way, work acquired an ethical dimension.

stems_affixes.word_buile: acquire获得;学到+ed……的→adj.后天习得的
acquire获得;学到+ment表名词→n.取得,习得;成就,造诣
en进入……之中+quir寻求,询问+y状态→n.询问

stems_affixes.value_cn: 需求, 要求, 必要条件, 需要的东西
stems_affixes.word_buile: require[v.需要;[of]要求,命令]+ment表名词→n.需求, 要求, 必要条件, 需要的东西

stems_affixes.value_cn: 获得;学到[知识等];养成[习惯]
stems_affixes.word_buile: ac加强动作+quir寻求,询问+e→寻求得到,获取
en进入……之中+quir寻求,询问+e→进入询问之中→询问
in进入+quir寻求,询问+e→问进去→盘问
re再+quir寻求,询问+e→再寻求→请求

Sentence.sentence: Is creativity a natural gift like good looks, or is it something that can be acquired like knowledge?

means.word_mean: (尤指靠自己的努力或行动)获得的，得到的；习得的

sentences.en: The business was acquired from Orion four years ago.
sentences.cn: 这铺子是4年前从列昂那儿买来的。

sentences.en: How can such a large quantity of know-ledge be acquired?
sentences.cn: 这么大量的知识怎样才能学到呢?

sentences.en: The picture was acquired by bequest in 1921.
sentences.cn: 这幅画是在1921年通过遗赠获得的。

sentences.en: The ability to use a language can be acquired by the act of using the language.
sentences.cn: 运用语言的能力,只能通过不断练习才能获得。

sentences.en: By sheer ability and force of character he has acquired the present position.
sentences.cn: 他获得目前的职位全凭他的才能和坚毅的性格。

sentences.en: Skill is acquired through repeated practice,and practice makes perfect.
The term ‘alexia’ is used to refer to any acquired disorder of reading.
sentences.cn: “失读症”常用来指后天阅读障碍。

sentences.en: We do not know which behavioural traits are inherited and which acquired.
sentences.cn: 我们不知道哪些行为特征是遗传的，哪些是后天养成的。

means.word_mean: 起初不喜欢但后来逐渐培养的爱好；养成的爱好

sentences.cn: 威士忌酒要喝惯了才会喜欢。

sentences.en: Decaffeinated coffee is an acquired taste.
sentences.cn: 喝脱去咖啡因的咖啡是慢慢养成的嗜好。

sentences.en: Art is an acquired taste—no one is born knowing that Michelangelo is wonderful.
sentences.cn: 艺术是一种后天养成的兴趣，没有人生来就知道米开朗基罗作品的美妙。
